scripts.load: yarn run clone-desktop && cd element-desktop && yarn && yarn run fetch --noverify --cfgdir ""
scripts.create-custom-config: mkdir element-desktop/myconfig && yarn run run-c && cd element-desktop && yarn run fetch --cfgdir myconfig
scripts.start: cd element-desktop && yarn add electron && yarn start
scripts.start-custom: yarn run load && yarn run create-custom-config && yarn run start
